thread.title: Cheap Thrill: The Best Transitional Sweater
thread.title_full: Cheap Thrill: The Best Transitional Sweater -- The Cut

author: Lindsay Peoples
title: Cheap Thrill: The Best Transitional Sweater
text:
Photo: Aritzia
Every Monday at the Cut, we're highlighting one great purchase that won't eat up your whole paycheck. If you're looking for something to splurge on instead, check back every Friday for one great purchase that's absolutely worth eating ramen noodles for the rest of eternity.
Artizia's knit sleeveless sweater is perfect for early fall's in-between weather. Wear it now paired with jeans and a quirky bucket bag , then layer it over a long-sleeved thermal or collared shirt once winter comes around. Nice detail: It's knit with pure, soft merino wool, so you don't have to worry about itching all day.
Aritzia Sleeveless Sweater, $125 at Aritzia
